data.description: Perl interface to CCDICT Chinese dictionary
data.similar:
Lingua::ZH::CEDICT - an interface to the CEDICT Chinese dictionary,
    other modules in the Lingua::ZH::* namespace may be useful in
    conjunction with this module
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Well, it's for Chinese, so Lingua::ZH is a no-brainer, and CCDICT
    makes sense since the dictionary is called CCDICT.
